Class FESI.awtgui.AwtGuiFactory 

FESI.gui.GuiFactory
   |
   +----FESI.awtgui.AwtGuiFactory
public class AwtGuiFactory
extends GuiFactory
Factory class to create the GUI elements, used to achieve independence of GUI implementation at compile time.

AwtGuiFactory()
Must have a null constructor so that it can be created by newInstance

displayMessageBox(String, String)
Display an error message using the AWT message box
makeConsole(InterpreterCommands, String, int, int)
Create aa new console

Must have a null constructor so that it can be created by newInstance
